TopicTitle: Looking For a mod with EVA Rails

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm looking for a mod to install EVA Rails on a station/vessel/satellite.

Thanks

Hello,

http://bfy.tw/2ntX

[quote name='Svm420'][URL]http://bfy.tw/2ntX[/URL][/QUOTE]

Google is not good for finding mods, your very 'link' resulted in outdated mods as old as 0.25. This forum exists for mod requests and not your ugly sarcasm. The OP did what he was supposed to.

[quote name='Gora511']Hello,

I'm looking for a mod to install EVA Rails on a station/vessel/satellite.

You might look at this mod NEBULA EVA handrails [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100531-0-25-NEBULA-space-engineering-EVA-handrails-pack/page9[/url] and this post on #77 [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100531-0-25-NEBULA-space-engineering-EVA-handrails-pack?p=2029039&viewfull=1#post2029039[/url]
